title.native: 咲う アルスノトリア すんっ！
title.english: Smile of the Arsnotoria the Animation

description:
Here in this magic academy city of Ashram, where everyone is required to live in dormitories, a close-knit group of girls known as "Pentagrams" pursue their studies, including training in manners and magic, to become "true ladies." Arsnotoria, one of the students in Ashram, lives in Dorm 5 and is always with her dormmate friends: Mel, who's the life of the party, Petit Albert, who's quiet and does things at her own pace, Picatrix, who wants to be the class president, and Abramelin, who's always cool. They take classes and work on their school duties together, and they throw tea parties after school in "that room"... We'll share the girls' fun and lively days with you!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/龍輪直征)

He began his career in 2000 as an animator at Studio Giants; in 2004, he began working for [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/), where in 2011 he made his debut as a director with [Katte ni Kaizou](https://anilist.co/anime/10191/). In 2016 he left Shaft and went freelance. In 2019, he started working for [Passione](https://anilist.co/studio/911/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%B8%E7%94%B0%E9%9A%86%E5%AE%8F)

Takahiro Kishida is an animator and renown character designer.

Kishida's designs are well received by animators and attract talent into shows easily. He is also praised for his shot composition skills and copies of his layouts are widely distributed in the industry as drawing reference. Nowadays he is mostly only credited for character design in the shows he participates in, but in reality he works as an animation director uncredited quite often. He rarely heavily corrects the key animator's cuts, strongly believing that the animators' distinctiveness should be noticeable.

Noted for his designs on shows like [Haikyuu](https://anilist.co/anime/20464/), [Serial Experiments Lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/), [Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/), [Baccano](https://anilist.co/anime/2251/) and more.

Nitro Plus, sometimes written as Nitro+, is a Japanese visual novel developer that has developed a number of visual novels, including eroge. They have been collaborating with TYPE-MOON (another developer) to create the light novel series, Fate/Zero.  They also have a branch of the company called Nitro+Chiral, which focuses on BL visual novels. Their works usually have dark themes such as reanimation of the dead and murder.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/itoken438)__

__Birthplace:__ Mie Prefecture, Japan

__Ken Itou__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nino_haji)

Hajime Ichinomi is a Japanese novelist and light novel writer. Works for Nitroplus.

__Height:__ 150 cm
__Agency:__ Office Osawa

She is affiliated to talent agency Office Osawa.

[Profile (Office Osawa)](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/kunomisaki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuno_misaki0119)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Klee - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Mirabilis - Fire Emblem Heroes (VG)
- Cocoa - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Achates - Epic 7 (VG)

[Profile](http://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/tomita_miyu/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/miyu-tomita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyju_tomita) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tomita__miyu._/)

The Grand Prix winner of the 2014 Seiyuu Artist Training Program Selection competition, which was sponsored by Amuse and Ken Production. After being scouted by six talent agencies, she eventually joined Amuse.

She made her voice acting debut in 2015, voicing a number of unnamed characters in Himouto Umaru-chan.

Non-Anime Roles
• Layla - Genshin Impact (VG)
• Zara - Memento Mori (VG)
• New Jersey - Azur Lane (VG)
• Jiu Niangzi - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/itoken438)__

__Birthplace:__ Mie Prefecture, Japan

__Ken Itou__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/miku_bandmaid) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/KOBATOMIKU/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/KobatoMiku/)__

__Miku Kobato__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, guitarist and member of the rock band [BAND-MAID](https://anilist.co/staff/136557/BANDMAID).
